putteypieQuotes: I'm thinking about writing a book!
Can you give me title suggestions for my new book?
Please give me a new book to read!
I wonder what outfit I should wear today!
I want to help other Neopets with my books!
We've been friends for a really long time, haven't we?
Ow! I stepped on my tail by accident...
I should start making illustrations for my writing!
I wonder how our old friends are doing?
I can't wait until the next Gormball tournament!
